dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
dbxrefs.title: External resources

items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
items.title: External identifier

schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions

items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.
items.title: Alternate Accession

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type

description.description: A plain text description of the dataset.
description.title: Description

internal_tags.description: Some datasets are part of particular data collections
internal_tags.title: Internal tags

date_released.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned whe the object is releaesd.
date_released.title: Date released

schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

related_files.description: List of data files to be associated with the dataset.
related_files.title: Additional data files

description: Schema for submitting metadata for an annotation set.
title: Annotation

___supersedes.description: The annotation set(s) that this annotation set supersedes by virtue of being newer, better etc. than the one(s) it supersedes.
___supersedes.title: Supersedes

items.comment: See annotation.json for a list of available identifiers.

___software_used.description: A list of software used to derive the annotation calls.
___software_used.title: Software used

items.description: Version of software used to derived the annotation calls.
items.title: Software used

___relevant_life_stage.description: The life_stage for which the annotation is relevant.
___relevant_life_stage.comment: Note that some of the options are organism-specific so choose carefully.
___relevant_life_stage.title: Life stage
enum: mixed stage (late embryonic and L1 larva)

___relevant_timepoint.description: The timepoint for which the annotation is relevant.
___relevant_timepoint.title: Age

___annotation_type.description: The category that best describes the annotation set.
___annotation_type.title: Annotation type

___targets.description: For predictions of particular features (e.g. distribution of a histone mark), specify the predicted feature(s).
___targets.title: Target

items.description: For predictions of particular features (e.g. distribution of a histone mark), specify the predicted feature(s).
items.title: Targets

___encyclopedia_version.description: The version of the ENCODE encyclopedia to which this annotation belongs.
___encyclopedia_version.title: Encyclopedia version
